me.simple-description: **Helping** people to make the world a better place through **software**
me.about-me-description:
Hello, my name is Christian Bravo, a Frontend Developer from Guatemala with a great passion for web development using modern technologies. 

 I love solving problems, developing applications and creating dynamic, intuitive and accessible user interfaces. 

 Outside of the office you will find me playing soccer, collecting cactus, playing videogames and spending time with my pets and family.

home.no-recent-projects-message: Sorry, I'm still working on this section, you will see my projects soon :)

error.404-description: Sorry, but this page doesn't exist.

contact-me.title: Get in touch
contact-me.contact-me-description: Although I'm not currently looking for any new opportunities, my inbox is always open. Whether you have a question or just want to say Hello. I'll try my best to get back to you!

description: Development of new features for the PayPal Crypto Web Application.
Collaboration with multi-disciplinary teams of software engineers, designers and product managers.
Development of new features and bug fixes in web applications.
Development of web applications and landing pages.
Write performant and maintainable code adopting clean code culture.
Collaboration with multi-disciplinary teams of developers, designers and product managers.
Write and execute test cases and test scenarios.
Perform sanity, functional and regression testing.
Generate testing reports for developers and product analysts.
Create technical documentation and user manuals.
